code_snippet:
#[ouroboros::self_referencing]
pub struct TransactionStream<'a> {
    stmt: Statement,
    conn: MutexGuard<'a, InnerConnection>,
    metric_callback: Option<crate::metric::Callback>,
    #[borrows(mut conn, stmt, metric_callback)]
    #[not_covariant]
    stream: MetricStream<'this>,
}
